problem.body: You meet many people. Few match your pace, schedule, and mind. Big rooms drain energy. Follow-up fades.

matching.title: Matching that respects your time
matching.body: We score sport and level first. We lock time windows that fit. We map a short travel radius. We add stage and topic fit. We prefer triads so a drop still leaves a strong 1:1.
matching.note: You can pass on a match. Passes train the model.
